title: Rotini with Fresh Tomato and Thyme
ingredients: ½ pound dried “rotini” or any other spiral pasta
½ cup crumbled ricotta salata or feta cheese
instructions: Fill a 4-quart pasta pot three-fourths full with salted water and bring it to a boil.

Coarsely chop the tomatoes and minced garlic.  In a large bowl toss together the chopped tomatoes, garlic, thyme, with the vinegar, oil, and add salt and pepper to taste.  Let the mixture marinate for at least 20 minutes.

Cook the “rotini”, or the spiral pasta you are using, in the boiling water until “al dente”.  When done drain the pasta well in a colander and add it to the tomato mixture and toss.  Sprinkle with the cheese and serve immediately.
